mapper.insert: insert into work_reservation_order (ro_id, reservation_order_no, customer_id, car_id, reservation_shop, reservation_type, reservation_date, from_type, reservation_status, follow_service_by, enabled_mark, contacts, contacts_mobile, description, create_user_name, create_user_Id, create_date, modify_user_name, modify_user_Id, modify_date, car_no) values (#{roId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservationOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservationShop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reservationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reservationStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{followServiceBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carNo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update work_reservation_order set reservation_order_no = #{reservationOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reservation_shop = #{reservationShop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reservation_type = #{reservationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reservation_date = #{reservationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, from_type = #{fromType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reservation_status = #{reservationStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, follow_service_by = #{followServiceBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled_mark = #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts_mobile = #{contactsMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_Id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_Id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ro_id = #{roId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ro_id, reservation_order_no, customer_id, car_id, reservation_shop, reservation_type, reservation_date, from_type, reservation_status, follow_service_by, enabled_mark, contacts, contacts_mobile, description, create_user_name, create_user_Id, create_date, modify_user_name, modify_user_Id, modify_date, car_no from work_reservation_order where ro_id = #{roId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ro_id, reservation_order_no, customer_id, car_id, reservation_shop, reservation_type, reservation_date, from_type, reservation_status, follow_service_by, enabled_mark, contacts, contacts_mobile, description, create_user_name, create_user_Id, create_date, modify_user_name, modify_user_Id, modify_date, car_no from work_reservation_order

select ro_id, reservation_order_no, customer_id, car_id, reservation_shop, reservation_type, reservation_date, from_type, reservation_status, follow_service_by, enabled_mark, contacts, contacts_mobile, ifnull(description, 'NULL') as description, create_user_name, create_user_Id, create_date, modify_user_name, modify_user_Id, modify_date, car_no from work_reservation_order where reservation_order_no = #{reservationOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ro_id, reservation_order_no, customer_id, car_id, reservation_shop, reservation_type, reservation_date, from_type, reservation_status, follow_service_by, enabled_mark, contacts, contacts_mobile, create_user_name, create_user_Id, create_date, modify_user_name, modify_user_Id, modify_date, car_no, ifnull(description, 'NULL') as description from work_reservation_order where car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and reservation_status < 3 order by reservation_date desc

select wro.ro_id as roId, wro.reservation_order_no as orderNo, wro.reservation_shop as reservationShop, wro.reservation_type as reservationType, wro.reservation_date as reservationDate, wro.reservation_status as status, wro.contacts, wro.contacts_mobile as contactsMobile, wro.description, wro.create_date as createDate, wro.car_no as carNo, cus.realname as customerName from work_reservation_order wro left join customer_info cus on cus.c_id = wro.customer_id where 1 = 1
and wro.car_no like CONCAT('%', #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and wro.reservation_status = #{orderStatus}
and wro.reservation_date >= CONCAT(#{reservationDateStart}, '0:0:0')
and wro.reservation_date <= CONCAT(#{reservationDateEnd}, '23:59:59')
order by wro.reservation_date desc
LIMIT #{startIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(0) from work_reservation_order wro left join customer_info cus on cus.c_id = wro.customer_id where 1 = 1
and wro.car_no like CONCAT('%', #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and wro.reservation_status = #{orderStatus}
and wro.reservation_date >= CONCAT(#{reservationDateStart}, '0:0:0')
and wro.reservation_date <= CONCAT(#{reservationDateEnd}, '23:59:59')
mapper.update: update work_reservation_order set reservation_status = 5 where reservation_date <= #{reservationDateHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and reservation_status < 3
